title: Heritage Cottage Stay in a Coffee Plantation with All-inclusive Dining
description: Dreaming of a tranquil holiday for you and your loved one? Embark on an Escapes Club getaway in a gorgeous cottage surrounded by stunning greenery, nestled in a 200-acre coffee plantation full of old-world charm. You’ll find all that and more at Old Kent Estates & Spa, located in Coorg, an incredible area also known as the ‘Scotland of India’. Enjoy daily breakfasts, lunches and dinner during this relaxing escape.
offer_address: Old Kent Estate Road, Horur, Kodagu, Kodagu, Karnataka 571237, India

title: Heritage Cottage Stay in Coorg Coffee Plantation with Daily Dining
description:
Experience old-world charm and luxurious seclusion at Old Kent Estates & Spa, an undisturbed sanctuary hidden amid a 200-acre coffee plantation in Coorg. Just five hours' drive from the IT City of Bengaluru, this restored heritage bungalow promises total exclusivity and privacy. A perfect escape from everyday life - not just for a vacation but also working professionals who can turn this green paradise into their temporary office. Your exotic escape includes daily breakfast and dinner. 

**Can't take a break from work?** Work out of the estate with the five-night 'workation' package and enjoy all-inclusive meals.
offer_address: Thaikappa Estate, Horoor Post, Suntikoppa, Old Kent Estate Rd, Kodagu Coorg, Karnataka 571237

title: Chic Five-Star Coorg Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Nature Walk
description:
Enveloped by mist and lush greenery, the five-star Aurika Coorg sprawls over 45 acres of landscaped gorgeousness amid coffee and spice plantations. Located less than a six-hour drive from Bengaluru and a three-hour drive from Mysuru, this Coorg paradise redefines luxury with its aesthetic interiors, modern amenities, experiential recreational facilities, extensive culinary delights and pet-friendly amenities. Ideal for couples, families and pet parents, Aurika Coorg is a heavenly paradise designed purely to help you and your loved ones unwind.

An idyllic retreat for any nature-lover, the five-star resort has a glimmering blue outdoor pool, a grand spa, Araya, a unique wine and coffee lounge, Roast & Red, a private cabana deck, Aura, a stargazing terrace, Au.rion and even a kids’ play area - Rumpus Room. Conveniently located close to the city centre, one can visit the popular tourist attractions - Madikeri Fort, Raja’s Seat, Abbey Falls, all within easy reach of the resort. Portraying the rich culture of the native Kodavas through their cuisine, Aurika Coorg preserves the Coorgi legacy while also dabbling well with global cuisines at Mirasa - their multi-cuisine restaurant.

Bask in the panoramic natural vistas of the forested vales of the ‘Scotland of India’ and escape the hustle-bustle of the city in a lavish style.

title: Luxe Coorg Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Daily Experiences
description:
With a wealth of natural splendour surrounding the resort, Coorg Wilderness Resort & Spa is a lavish oasis in the tropical wilderness of 'Scotland of India'. Easily accessible from Bengaluru (a 5.5-hour drive) and close to Madikeri (a 15-minute drive), this ultra-luxe resort is a treasure trove of indulgent spaces, rejuvenating experiences, and luxurious amenities, all with a splash of Mother Nature's magic. Get away from the daily grind and relax in opulent rooms and suites designed with European Chalet-inspired features where large bay windows welcome the gentle winter sun rays. 

You will be greeted by the wilderness at your door, ready to take you on a variety of adventures every day, no matter what time of day it is. With multiple dining options offering a variety of cuisines, a luxe spa with pampering massages, an indoor game space for your little ones, a Sunset View Point and a breathtaking infinity pool, Coorg Wilderness Resort & Spa promises to keep everyone happy.
offer_address: Virajpet Main Road, Mekeri, Madikeri, Karnataka 571201, India

title: Tranquil Coorg Golf Resort Stay with Daily Breakfast, One Dinner & Drinks
description:
A serene hideaway in the lap of nature, Amritara Ambatty Greens Resort Coorg is a tranquil oasis of peace and quiet. Located in an area known as the 'Scotland of India', this gorgeous sanctuary is a scenic six-hour drive from Bengaluru, making it a popular weekend getaway destination for city folks. Elegant rooms offer you scenic views of the peaceful hills, an infinity pool invites you for a refreshing swim under the clear blue sky and the golf course calls out to the sports enthusiasts to practice their best shots.

Enjoy delicious food served at the restaurant, made with the utmost care by excellent chefs, cuddle up by the bonfire to enjoy the tranquillity, keep yourself and your young ones entertained with indoor games, or head off on a plantation tour to get up close with nature (extra charges apply). These delights and so much more await at this award-winning property that was awarded a Travellers' Choice Award 2022 by Tripadvisor. If it's a lush green paradise you seek, this destination will not disappoint you.
offer_address: Bitangalla, near Coorg Golf links, Virajpet, Coorg, Karnataka 571213 India

title: Tranquil Country Escape in Coorg
description: Discover a tranquil hideaway amongst the lush green hills of Coorg. Stay three nights in a Panorama Room with daily international buffet breakfasts, one delicious three-course dining experience, a 30-minute head massage for each adult and one complimentary coffee plantation tour for two.
offer_address: Guddehosur Post, Kushalnagar, COORG, Karnataka 571234, India

title: Five-Star Ayatana Coorg Escape with Private Waterfall, Daily All-Inclusive Dining & Experiences
description:
Nestled amid the lush greenery of Coorg’s misty rainforests, the uber-chic WelcomeHeritage Ayatana Coorg sprawls luxuriously over 100 acres with a gurgling private seasonal waterfall. Lulled by birdsong and enveloped by forests and mountain vistas, the secluded and highly exclusive property is easily accessible from Mysuru (a three-hour drive), Mangaluru (a four-hour drive) and Bengaluru (a six-hour drive). Reverberating with the natural splendours of ‘Scotland of India’, WelcomeHeritage Ayatana Coorg casts an enchanting spell with its verdant landscapes, treehouse-inspired cottages, a babbling stream, a glorious infinity pool, outdoor adventures, a lavish spa and an exquisite multi-cuisine restaurant.

Whilst at WelcomeHeritage Ayatana Coorg, soak up the cultural heritage of the native Kodavas, visit neighbouring coffee estates, take in generous whiffs of the spice plantations and fall in love with the mouth-watering Coorgi cuisine - from delicious noolputtus to aromatic pandi curries. For those feeling adventurous, trek around and explore the cascading waterfalls, the alluring Western Ghats, or even bicycle along the winding roads and feel one with nature.
offer_address: Ayatana Coorg, Mallalli Water Falls Rd, Kumaralli, Karnataka 573123 India

title: Family-Friendly Coorg Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Immerse yourself in luxury and relaxation at Purple Palms Resort & Spa, a secluded retreat hidden away in the 'Scotland of India', Coorg. Located just five hours' drive from Bengaluru, this sophisticated paradise is perfect for a nature escape, a family break or even a weekend staycation. Immerse yourself in trekking, white-water rafting and peaceful coffee plantation walks and impress the kids with an onsite play area and games room.

This relaxing escape in Coorg includes daily breakfast and daily dinner (buffet or à la carte).

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged five years and under) stay free on existing bedding with daily breakfast and dinner.
offer_address: Bolluru Village, Guddehosur, BM Rd, near Kaveri Nisargadhama, Kushalnagar, Karnataka 571234

title: Relaxing Coorg Golf Resort Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Drinks
description:
Retreat into the lap of nature at Amritara Ambatty Greens Resort Coorg, a tranquil oasis nestled in the verdant Western Ghats. Located in an area known as the 'Scotland of India', this gorgeous sanctuary is a scenic six-hour drive from Bengaluru, making it a popular weekend getaway destination for city folks. Elegant rooms offer you scenic views of the peaceful hills, an infinity pool invites you for a refreshing swim under the clear blue sky and the golf course calls out to the sports enthusiasts to tee off.

Enjoy delicious food served at the restaurant, made with the utmost care by excellent chefs, huddle up by the bonfire to enjoy the tranquillity, keep yourself and your young ones entertained with indoor games, or head off on a plantation tour to get up close with nature (extra charges apply). If it's a lush green paradise you seek, this destination will not disappoint you.
offer_address: Bitangalla, near Coorg Golf links, Virajpet, Coorg, Karnataka 571213 India

title: Best-Selling Ayatana Coorg Escape with Private Waterfall & All-Inclusive Meals
description:
Enchanting, exquisite and exotic, WelcomHeritage Ayatana Coorg is a five-star resort tucked away in the dense rainforests of Coorg. Highly secluded and super exclusive, this hilly retreat sprawls over 100 acres of private land and is your ideal escape from the world. Easily accessible from Bengaluru, Mangaluru and Mysuru, WelcomHeritage Ayatana Coorg boasts its very own private waterfall (seasonal), a sparkling stream, treehouse-inspired cottages and a gorgeous infinity pool. Add to this a multi-culinary restaurant, a stunning bar, a lavish spa and exciting outdoor experiences and you will find one of the best resorts in Coorg.

Ideal for families, couples and friends, WelcomHeritage Ayatana Coorg exemplifies Coorg's natural splendour with its perfect blend of natural beauty and contemporary luxury. Wake to misty mornings, bask in stunning views of the private waterfall and surrounding mountains, take in the aroma of coffee and spice plantations, savour culinary delights, explore the Western Ghats, and watch your worries melt away. Do you really need anything more?
offer_address: Ayatana Coorg, Mallalli Water Falls Rd, Kumaralli, Karnataka 573123 India

title: Luxe Coorg Coffee Estate Escape with All-inclusive Dining & Guided Plantation Walk
description:
Secluded within 25 acres of aromatic coffee estate, The Windflower Resort & Spa Coorg is among the best resorts in the 'Scotland of India'. An easy drive from Bengaluru and Mysuru, the resort is an ideal holiday choice for all nature lovers and serenity seekers. Retreat to elegant rooms that offer sweeping views of the coffee plantations, treat your taste buds to some authentic Kodava delicacies at the restaurant, or unwind with a massage or two at the spa. Families will love the gorgeous infinity pool, a highlight of the property, that lets you enjoy some quiet moments with nature. Did we mention the resort boasts a private seasonal waterfall?

In the embrace of one of the world's 34 biodiversity hotspots, the resort has the soft touches of nature in every nook and corner. Close to all the popular attractions of Coorg, it is also the perfect base for you to enjoy some major tourist attractions, including Nisargadhama, Abbey Falls, Talacauvery and more.
offer_address: Survey No. 201/P1, Kedakal Village, Suntikoppa Hobli, Somwarpet Taluk, Madikeri, Karnataka 571237, India

title: Grand Opening Five-Star Coorg Escape with Gourmet Dining & Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Lose yourself in the misty mountains, verdant coffee plantations and enchanting ambience of Coorg with a stay at Aurika, Coorg - Luxury by Lemon Tree Hotels, a brand-new five-star retreat. Less than six hours from Bengaluru and three hours from Mysuru, this heavenly paradise is where stress goes to take a vacation.

Step into this 45-acre property, hidden within the rainforests of Coorg, and enjoy a tranquil break in the lap of nature. Find your nirvana in the serene corners of this luxurious resort, replace city sounds with the melodious chirp of birds, explore the famous Western Ghats, pamper your loved ones with delicious dining... and simply lose yourself in everything that Aurika, Coorg - Luxury by Lemon Tree Hotels has to offer. Did we mention the resort is also pet-friendly? You won't have to worry about leaving your furry friends behind while you escape (see Fine Print for more details).
